analysis.description:
DecentBetToken.finalizeCrowdfunding (/unique_chucks/2/0x540449e4d172cd9491c76320440cd74933d5691a.sol#920-958) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! decentBetMultisig.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/2/0x540449e4d172cd9491c76320440cd74933d5691a.sol#957-958)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0x540449e4d172cd9491c76320440cd74933d5691a.sol:
	Contract DecentBetVault has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0x540449e4d172cd9491c76320440cd74933d5691a.sol#506-508)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/2/0x540449e4d172cd9491c76320440cd74933d5691a.sol#67-74) shadows built-in symbol "assert"
MultiSigWallet.executeTransaction.tx (local variable @ /unique_chucks/2/0x540449e4d172cd9491c76320440cd74933d5691a.sol#320-322) shadows built-in symbol "tx"

Reentrancy in DecentBetToken.DecentBetToken (/unique_chucks/2/0x540449e4d172cd9491c76320440cd74933d5691a.sol#595-636):
	External calls:
	- ! timeVault.isDecentBetVault() (/unique_chucks/2/0x540449e4d172cd9491c76320440cd74933d5691a.sol#633-634)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- decentBetMultisig (/unique_chucks/2/0x540449e4d172cd9491c76320440cd74933d5691a.sol#634)

UpgradeAgent.isUpgradeAgent should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x540449e4d172cd9491c76320440cd74933d5691a.sol#451-453)
UpgradeAgent.owner should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x540449e4d172cd9491c76320440cd74933d5691a.sol#451)
